page.title: 15SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: There are many causes of concern within the village but the main one is unemployment especially among the young people. The older people are also concerned about the future of the village if the young people are forced to leave to look for work. There is also concern about the lack of amenaties and the way in which the local council appears to be neglecting the village. Old houses are being left derelict and if they are demolished the sites are not tidied up.There is also a concern about law and order, there is a lot of vandalism and there appears to be nothing the police can do about it. There is nothing to take the young people off the streets at night, there is a youth centre but no funds to run it properly.
